verses.verse: וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> his own house בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> was building שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> But Solomon שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיְכַ֖ל <S%H3615><s%> and he finished אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> all his house

וַיִּ֜בֶן <S%H1129><s%> He built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית ׀ <S%H1004><s%> also the house יַ֣עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest הַלְּבָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon מֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> thereof [was] an hundred אַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <S%H753><s%> the length וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> thereof fifty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמָת֑וֹ <S%H6967><s%> and the height עַ֗ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבָּעָה֙ <S%H702><s%> upon four טוּרֵי֙ <S%H2905><s%> rows עַמּוּדֵ֣י <S%H5982><s%> pillars אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar וּכְרֻת֥וֹת <S%H3773><s%> beams אֲרָזִ֖ים <S%H730><s%> with cedar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H5982><s%> upon the pillars

וְסָפֻ֣ן <S%H5603><s%> And [it was] covered בָּאֶ֗רֶז <S%H730><s%> with cedar מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H4605><s%> above עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַצְּלָעֹת֙ <S%H6763><s%> upon the beams אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H5982><s%> pillars אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> that [lay] on forty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H2568><s%> five חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> fifteen הַטּֽוּר׃ <S%H2905><s%> [in] a row

וּשְׁקֻפִ֖ים <S%H8261><s%> And [there were] windows שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> [in] three טוּרִ֑ים <S%H2905><s%> rows וּמֶחֱזָ֥ה <S%H4237><s%> and light אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> was opposite מֶחֱזָ֖ה <S%H4237><s%> [was] against light שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [in] three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> ranks

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַפְּתָחִ֥ים <S%H6607><s%> And all the doors וְהַמְּזוּז֖וֹת <S%H4201><s%> and posts רְבֻעִ֣ים <S%H7251><s%> [were] square שָׁ֑קֶף <S%H8260><s%> with the windows וּמ֧וּל <S%H4136><s%> [was] against מֶחֱזָ֛ה <S%H4237><s%> and light אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֶחֱזָ֖ה <S%H4237><s%> light שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> [in] three פְּעָמִֽים׃ <S%H6471><s%> ranks

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> אוּלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> a porch הָֽעַמּוּדִים֙ <S%H5982><s%> of pillars עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> And he made חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> thereof [was] fifty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H753><s%> the length וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thereof thirty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth וְאוּלָם֙ <S%H197><s%> and the porch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> [was] before וְעַמֻּדִ֥ים <S%H5982><s%> them and the [other] pillars וְעָ֖ב <S%H5646><s%> and the thick beam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> front

וְאוּלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> a porch הַכִּסֵּא֙ <S%H3678><s%> for the throne אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יִשְׁפָּט־ <S%H8199><s%> where he might judge שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אֻלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> [even] the porch הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> Then he made וְסָפ֣וּן <S%H5603><s%> and [it was] covered בָּאֶ֔רֶז <S%H730><s%> with cedar מֵהַקַּרְקַ֖ע <S%H7172><s%> from one side of the floor עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַקַּרְקָֽע׃ <S%H7172><s%> to the other

וּבֵיתוֹ֩ <S%H1004><s%> And his house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom יֵ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> where he dwelt שָׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> in it חָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הָאַחֶ֗רֶת <S%H312><s%> [had] another מִבֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> within לָֽאוּלָ֔ם <S%H197><s%> the porch כַּמַּֽעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> [which] was of the like work הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> the same הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become וּבַ֜יִת <S%H1004><s%> also an house יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> made לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> for Pharaoh's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> whom he had taken שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon כָּאוּלָ֖ם <S%H197><s%> [to wife] like unto this porch הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲבָנִ֤ים <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרֹת֙ <S%H3368><s%> All these [were of] costly כְּמִדֹּ֣ת <S%H4060><s%> according to the measures גָּזִ֔ית <S%H1496><s%> of hewed stones מְגֹרָר֥וֹת <S%H1641><s%> sawed בַּמְּגֵרָ֖ה <S%H4050><s%> with saws מִבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> within וּמִח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> and without וּמִמַּסָּד֙ <S%H4527><s%> even from the foundation עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַטְּפָח֔וֹת <S%H2947><s%> unto the coping וּמִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> and [so] on the outside עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַגְּדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> toward the great

וּמְיֻסָּ֕ד <S%H3245><s%> And the foundation אֲבָנִ֥ים <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָר֖וֹת <S%H3368><s%> [was of] costly אֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֑וֹת <S%H1419><s%> even great אַבְנֵי֙ <S%H68><s%> stones עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> of ten אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits וְאַבְנֵ֖י <S%H68><s%> and stones שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> of eight אַמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וּמִלְמַ֗עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> And above אֲבָנִ֧ים <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָר֛וֹת <S%H3368><s%> [were] costly כְּמִדּ֥וֹת <S%H4060><s%> after the measures גָּזִ֖ית <S%H1496><s%> of hewed stones וָאָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> and cedars

וְחָצֵ֨ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <S%H1419><s%> And the great סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> round about שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> [was] with three טוּרִ֣ים <S%H2905><s%> rows גָּזִ֔ית <S%H1496><s%> of hewed stones וְט֖וּר <S%H2905><s%> and a row כְּרֻתֹ֣ת <S%H3773><s%> beams אֲרָזִ֑ים <S%H730><s%> of cedar וְלַחֲצַ֧ר <S%H2691><s%> court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַפְּנִימִ֖ית <S%H6442><s%> both for the inner וּלְאֻלָ֥ם <S%H197><s%> and for the porch הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> of the house פ

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and fetched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חִירָ֖ם <S%H2438><s%> Hiram מִצֹּֽר׃ <S%H6865><s%> out of Tyre

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אִשָּׁה֩ <S%H802><s%> ess אַלְמָנָ֨ה <S%H490><s%> was a widow's ה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִמַּטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe נַפְתָּלִ֗י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali וְאָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> and his father אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> [was] a man צֹרִי֮ <S%H6876><s%> of Tyre חֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H2794><s%> artificer נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <S%H5178><s%> in brass וַ֠יִּמָּלֵא <S%H4390><s%> and he was filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחָכְמָ֤ה <S%H2451><s%> with wisdom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּבוּנָה֙ <S%H8394><s%> and understanding וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדַּ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> and cunning לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to work כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> all works בַּנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> in brass וַיָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and wrought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4399><s%> all his work

וַיָּ֛צַר <S%H6696><s%> For he cast אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two הָעַמּוּדִ֖ים <S%H5982><s%> pillars נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֜ה <S%H6240><s%> teen אַמָּ֗ה <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמַת֙ <S%H6967><s%> high הָעַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> of one וְחוּט֙ <S%H2339><s%> and a line שְׁתֵּים־ <S%H8147><s%> of both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits יָסֹ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> of them about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַמּ֥וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillars הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> either

וּשְׁתֵּ֨י <S%H8147><s%> two כֹתָרֹ֜ת <S%H3805><s%> chapiters עָשָׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> And he made לָתֵ֛ת <S%H5414><s%> to set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> upon the tops הָֽעַמּוּדִ֖ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars מֻצַ֣ק <S%H3332><s%> [of] molten נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five אַמּ֗וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמַת֙ <S%H6967><s%> the height הַכֹּתֶ֣רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הָאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> of the one וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קוֹמַ֖ת <S%H6967><s%> and the height הַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> of the other

שְׂבָכִ֞ים <S%H7638><s%> [And] nets מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work שְׂבָכָ֗ה <S%H7639><s%> of checker גְּדִלִים֙ <S%H1434><s%> and wreaths מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work שַׁרְשְׁר֔וֹת <S%H8333><s%> of chain לַכֹּ֣תָרֹ֔ת <S%H3805><s%> for the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> which [were] upon the top הָעַמּוּדִ֑ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars שִׁבְעָה֙ <S%H7651><s%> seven לַכֹּתֶ֣רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הָאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> for the one וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven לַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> for the other

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַמּוּדִ֑ים <S%H5982><s%> the pillars וּשְׁנֵי֩ <S%H8147><s%> and two טוּרִ֨ים <S%H2905><s%> rows סָבִ֜יב <S%H5439><s%> round about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשְּׂבָכָ֣ה <S%H7639><s%> network הָאֶחָ֗ת <S%H259><s%> upon the one לְכַסּ֤וֹת <S%H3680><s%> to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּֽתָרֹת֙ <S%H3805><s%> the chapiters אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> that [were] upon the top הָֽרִמֹּנִ֔ים <S%H7416><s%> with pomegranates וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> and so עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and so did לַכֹּתֶ֖רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> he for the other

וְכֹֽתָרֹ֗ת <S%H3805><s%> And the chapiters אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> that [were] upon the top הָעַמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> work שׁוּשַׁ֣ן <S%H7799><s%> [were] of lily בָּֽאוּלָ֑ם <S%H197><s%> in the porch אַרְבַּ֖ע <S%H702><s%> four אַמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

וְכֹתָרֹ֗ת <S%H3805><s%> And the chapiters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> upon the two הָֽעַמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H5982><s%> pillars גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H4605><s%> [had pomegranates] also above מִלְּעֻמַּ֣ת <S%H5980><s%> over against הַבֶּ֔טֶן <S%H990><s%> the belly אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לְעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [was] by [שְׂבָכָה כ] (הַשְּׂבָכָ֑ה <S%H7639><s%> checker ק) וְהָרִמּוֹנִ֤ים <S%H7416><s%> and the pomegranates מָאתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3967><s%> [were] two hundred טֻרִ֣ים <S%H2905><s%> in rows סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּתֶ֥רֶת <S%H3805><s%> chapiter הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> upon the other
